title: Teen Mind-Body - Integrated Care Concepts And Consultation
description: ICCC is committed to delivering trauma-sensitive mind-body work for teens and seeks to restore a sense of connection through safe practices and communication.
cleaned_text: bodies and growing minds are two hallmarks of adolescence, and at Integrated Care Concepts and Consultation we use mind-body approaches to help teens navigate these unique challenges and many more. From equine therapy to Dialectical Behavioral Therapy, we provide young people with the chance to heal in their own unique manner. Each mind-body technique that we share with our teen clients is tailored to their unique needs. Whether it's yoga or breathwork, mindfulness or group therapy, we're focused on helping young people find peace and flourish on their healing journey. Mind-Body Groups for Teens Call now, the present moment is waiting for you to schedule.
